alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 10:12PM MST until July 17 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... * Until 1100 PM MST. * At 1012 PM MST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Castle Hot Springs to near Circle City to 9 miles west of White Tank Mountain Park to near Buckeye, moving northwest at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Surprise, Buckeye, Wickenburg, Wittmann, Tonopah, Circle City and Morristown. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 85 and 114. US Highway 60 between mile markers 88 and 133. AZ Route 74 between mile markers 1 and 15. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
